ValidationRule.description: For Upsells, sales qualifier and owner cannot be the same person.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Profile.Name = "Automated Process"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Existing Business-Upsell"), OR( ISCHANGED(Sales_Qualifier_New__c), ISCHANGED(OwnerId)), Sales_Qualifier_New__r.User_ID_18_digits__c = Owner_ID_18_digits__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Upsell Owner and Sales Qualifier cannot be the same person.
